title: 2021 UCI Road World Championships preview and schedule
content:
The UCI Road World Championships are, as the name suggests, the definitive world stage. This year’s set of races in Leuven looks to be as dramatic as ever.

Below, we take a look at the when and where of the major races of the 2021 World Champs in Leuven. Take a look at the links to our more in-depth previews of the larger races to see our typically eerily accurate predictions on a winner.

Sunday 19th September

Men’s Elite Individual Time trial

Where: Knokke-Heist to Bruges

When: 14:30-16:55 CET

Read our full preview

Monday 20th September

Men’s U23 Individual Time trial

Where: Knokke-Heist to Bruges

When: 10:40-12:50 CET

Women’s Elite Individual Time trial

Where: Knokke-Heist to Bruges

When: 14:40-16:40 CET

Read our full preview
